    • Method Detail

      • assertGdxLoaded

        public static void assertGdxLoaded(java.lang.String msg)
        Checks that gdx is correctly loaded.

        BitmapImage, DebugRenderer, MusicPlayer etc. cannot be created until Gdx is not loaded.

        Parameters:
        msg - The message to log if not loaded

      • callCheck

        public static void callCheck(java.lang.String className,
             java.lang.String method)
        Checks that a method is called only in a given class
        Parameters:
        className - The name of the class the method belongs to
        method - The method name that should be contained
